revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #40 Yache |image = [[File:Yache.png]] |caption = This Berry has a refreshing flavor that strikes a good balance of dryness and sourness. It tastes better chilled. This Berry slows the growth of nearby Berries. |growtime = 12h 0m 0s |harvest = 25 berries |replant = 5% |points = 1,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *15 sour }} '''Yache''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Passho]] with 8 empty plots. The [[Passho]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stage Durations ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- | 0-3600s || 3600-14400s || 14400-28800s || 28800-43200s || 43200-86400s |- | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:YacheTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:YacheTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:YacheTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Yache berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="height: 26px;" | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | |- | || [[Passho]] || || [[Passho]] || |- style="height: 26px;" | || || || || |- | || [[Passho]] || || [[Passho]] || |- style="height: 26px;" | || || || || |}
